TopicTitle: i just found this game recently

Articles.Content: it is the most fun i have had with a game in a long time,. super cool to branch out. see this game do alot. so to conclude. hello.
I tried the demo last month for a couple hours and was instantly hooked. Now I own it and this is all I play now. Everything else is collecting dust.

Welcome Aboard!

Yeah i already bought it back in 0.17 and its still the only thing i play recently.

So, have fun and fly safe!
Welcome! I know the feeling, it's definitely a breath of fresh air and you want to keep breathing it in.
You wasted your life up until this point, congratulations on taking steps into the future.

Welcome to the forums!

I'd highly recommend taking a look at some of the tutorials you can find on the site, as well as the ones listed in the Drawing Board (link in my sig). They have tons of useful information that you can use to do lots of awesome things. If you ever get stuck on anything in particular, feel free to ask questions in the How To section. Other than that, make yourself at home, and don't be afraid to jump into a conversation you find interesting.

Happy landings!

Hello,

I've found some interesting attachments (excel files) in this forum to helm me with the calculations but I can't download them because I don't have permission. Is it normal?

Welcome, happy rocket-engineering!

I tried the demo last month for a couple hours and was instantly hooked. Now I own it and this is all I play now. Everything else is collecting dust.

Hehe, I only lasted about 5 minutes into the demo before I bought it.
